name: None
prompt: {prompt}

name: Complementary Contrast — Opposite Tension
prompt: {prompt}, with (complementary color scheme), featuring (colors directly opposite on the color wheel creating maximum chromatic tension, vibrant visual energy from contrast, eye-catching dynamic balance, blue-orange or red-green or purple-yellow opposition)
negative_prompt: monochrome, muted, low saturation, no color contrast, neutral

name: Analogous Harmony — Neighboring Serenity
prompt: {prompt}, with (analogous color harmony), featuring (colors neighboring on the color wheel creating unified serene palette, gentle gradual transitions, nature-inspired cohesion, harmonious and calming visual flow)
negative_prompt: jarring contrast, complementary clash, extreme saturation, chaotic color

name: Triadic Vibrancy — Three-Point Balance
prompt: {prompt}, with (triadic color scheme), featuring (three colors equally spaced on the color wheel, vibrant balanced composition, dynamic yet harmonious, primary triad or secondary triad energy, playful chromatic richness)
negative_prompt: monochrome, two-tone, muted, desaturated, single color dominance

name: Monochromatic Depth — Single Hue Mastery
prompt: {prompt}, with (monochromatic color depth), featuring (single hue explored through full range of tints shades and tones, sophisticated tonal variation, elegant minimalist palette, depth through value not hue, refined restraint)
negative_prompt: multicolor, rainbow, clashing, complementary, vivid variety

name: Split-Complementary — Sophisticated Contrast
prompt: {prompt}, with (split-complementary color scheme), featuring (a base color plus two colors adjacent to its complement, softer contrast than full complementary, sophisticated chromatic tension, more nuanced visual interest)
negative_prompt: monotone, no contrast, single color, flat, neutral grey
